title: Trim portfolio to end after Skills and remove Connect/footer links

requirements.summary: Stop main page content after the Skills section by removing sections rendered after Skills (Gallery and Contact).
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/App.tsx` no longer imports or renders `GallerySection` and `ContactSection` after `SkillsSection`.
When viewing the app, scrolling past the Skills section does not reveal Gallery or Contact content.

file_operations.description: Remove imports and render calls for `GallerySection` and `ContactSection` so the `<main>` content ends after `<SkillsSection />`.

requirements.summary: Remove navigation links to deleted sections and keep smooth-scroll working for remaining sections.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/portfolio/SiteHeader.tsx` nav items do not include “Gallery” or “Contact”.
Clicking remaining header links (Home/About/Services/Experience/Skills) smooth-scrolls to the correct section without errors.

file_operations.description: Update `navItems` to remove entries for `#gallery` and `#contact` while keeping existing smooth-scroll behavior for `#hero`, `#about`, `#services`, `#experience`, and `#skills`.

requirements.summary: Update hero CTA buttons to only scroll to sections that still exist.
acceptanceCriteria: All visible hero buttons scroll to existing sections (for example `#skills` and/or `#experience`) and do not produce console errors when clicked.

file_operations.description: Replace or remove CTA button actions so no CTA calls `scrollToSection('#contact')` or `scrollToSection('#gallery')`; retarget CTAs to existing section IDs such as `#skills` and/or `#experience`.

requirements.summary: Remove the “Connect” footer column (including social icons) and rebalance footer layout.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/portfolio/SiteFooter.tsx` no longer displays the “Connect” heading or its social icon row.
Footer spacing/grid does not leave an empty third column; the remaining footer sections render cleanly on mobile and desktop.

file_operations.description: Remove the entire “Connect” block and related icon imports/usages; adjust the footer grid classes/content so the layout is balanced without an empty third column (e.g., shift to a 2-column layout on desktop).

requirements.summary: Remove footer Quick Links that point to deleted sections so no footer links target missing section IDs.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/portfolio/SiteFooter.tsx` quick links do not include anchors for `#gallery` or `#contact`.
No remaining footer links point to non-existent section IDs.

file_operations.description: Update the “Quick Links” list to remove links to `#gallery` and `#contact`, and ensure all remaining links point to section IDs that still exist (e.g., `#about`, `#services`, `#experience`, `#skills`, optionally `#hero`).
